mapper.update: update pcac_merchant_compared_investigation set batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_name = #{legalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where investigation_id = #{investigationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select investigation_id, batch_no, code, name, legal_name, create_time from pcac_merchant_compared_investigation
mapper.sql: a.investigation_id AS "investigationId", a.batch_no AS "bachNo", a.code AS "code", a.name AS "name", a.legal_name AS "legalName", a.create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM pcac_merchant_compared_investigation a
AND a.name = #{name}
and DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginCheckTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endCheckTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY investigation_id desc
